Customer: Ha to Cummins ha Cummins diesel generator search karega to wo aayega accha Mahindra ka aayega Mahindra hai fir aapko Ashok leyland hai.

Customer: Wo description me ha.

Are sir aap are bhaiya hum nahi samjhe hum aapke baat kyu nahi samajh pa rahe hai hamare kehne ka matlab ek hi chij hum bata rahe hai ki hum uska lead consume kar sakte hai lekin apne profile pe hum dusra brand ka promote nahi kar sakte hamare me price hum kaise denge wo bataiye to uska wo to hum bech nahi rahe hai. Chaliye thik hai aapka wo decision hai sir ek tisra bata dijiye Mahindra diesel generator iska bhi yani aap kar sakte hai. Ye mera mera decision nahi hai sir ye mera decision nahi hai ye chije common chije hai aap bhi samajhiye na ki aap dusra brand ko kaise promote kijiyega.

Executive: Sir mai promote ke liye baat hi nahi kar raha hu sir. Accha baat to isliye aap bole ki aap iska rate bataiye to hum rate kaise bata denge uska.

Executive: Sir abhi maine aapse confirm kiya ki aap Cummins diesel ka bata rahe hai to aapne bola ha bata rahe hai Ashok leyland ka aapne Mahindra DG set me mana kiya maine usme product add nahi kar raha hu. Nahi nahi nahi product Mahindra DG bhi to rakh sakte hai lekin hum kya bol rahe hai ki hum price nahi sir isme price take nahi karenge ya uska photo nahi lagayenge bas sab kya.

Hmm bas ye primary product isi tarike se humko isme product add karna hai. Fir fir fir fir fir aapko DG set add karna hai.

Executive: Mai sir DG set kya meri baat nahi samajh rahe mai DG set ki aapko baat hi nahi kar raha hu mai keh raha hu apni category bani hui hai agar aap product add karoge to aapko calls inquiries generate hongi properly aap isme add nahi karoge to aapko less number of calls inquiries nahi aayengi. Sir mera simple sa ye hai.

Customer: Aap wahi to bol rahe hai ki aap product add kijiye na to bata de ki humko inquiries se matlab hai.

Sir add matlab hum kya bol rahe hai hum sab baato ko nahi samajh rahe add matlab kya bol rahe hai hum apne profile me kisi ka nahi dikhna chahiye mere profile se.

Executive: Sir to mai wahi to aapko samjha raha hu ki agar aap add karoge isme to aapko calls inquiries properly aayegi aap keh rahe ho add karne se uska promotion promote nahi kar sakte other brand ka to mai aapse sirf simple se ye keh raha hu agar aap add nahi karte ho to uske isse aapko calls inquiries aana band ho jayengi sirf mai ye keh raha hu aapko.

Customer: Thik hai bhejiye ha isi call pe rahiye aap. Mera wala number pe bhej dijiye.

Customer: Ha ha ha.

Executive: Ha call pe rahiye mai bhej raha hu aapko bhejiye.

Executive: Dikha sir aapko screenshot.

Customer: Thik hai ye kya hai Mahindra diesel generator ye hai kaha pe DG set catalog category real consume interest.

Customer: Thik hai ye hai generator generator Mahindra generator Mahindra do bar ho gaya hai. Ji yahi mai aapko yahi samjha raha hu aapko yahi mai bata raha hu dekhiye apna nava product aapko dikh raha hai diesel engine generator set karke.

Customer: Thik hai is type se to aap nahi to ki dal sakte hai ye humko bhi puchna padega iske thik hai. Ab hum dekh lenge apna profile me tab aapko hum batayenge isko thik hai. Ha to abhi wahi mai aapko abhi isme abhi isme yahi rehne dijiye abhi hai na. Accha abhi isme kuch add nahi karna hai. Nahi abhi dekhte hai yaha pehle check kar lete hai ki kaha pe dikhega humko.

Executive: Ye sir ye maine aapko bheja ye hame inform karna hota hai aapko. Yaha pe niche likha hua hai. Accha thik hai aap pehle suniye pehle aap dal dijiye dalne ke baad kaha dikhta hai kaisa dikhta hai hum wo chij ko hum samajh lete hai thik hai na ab hum ab hamari baato ko nahi samajh pa rahe hum aapki baato ko nahi samajh pa rahe isliye hum usko practical dekh lenge ki kaisa dikh raha hai.

Executive: Dekhiye aapko mai simple sa ek baat batau suniye aap apna nava product dekhiye diesel engine generator set hai dikha aapko. Ha. Thik ye apni category bani hui hai diesel engine generator set thik apna ek dekho pehla product pehla product dikh raha hai aapko diesel engine generator set. Pehla me to hai DG set. Diesel engine generator set dekhiye aapko product dikh raha hai nava product dekhiye sir aap. Nava product yaha par nine me nine number. Ha ji ji dekho apna nine number to hai hi nahi sir seven number tak acha eight nine hai thik hai diesel engine generator set thik hai. Generator set ye apna ek product isme add hai thik hai iske category me product ki mapping karte hai add karte hai to hame properly calls inquiries valid vagera sab generate hoti hai thik hai without without adding product hame calls inquiries aana band ho jayengi sirf mera main kehna ye hai. Aur aapko maine teeno ke screenshot bhej diye jaha pe dekhiye d-rank likha hua hai dikh raha hai aapko. Kaise kitna number pe. Paanch number pe saat number pe aath number pe. Paanch number me kiloster generator hai che number pe hai na ye. Ha paanch number pe saat number pe aath number pe Mahindra diesel Mahindra diesel generator. Hmm hmm. Thik hai. Accha aap isme photo auto nahi dal rahe hai. Sir mai kuch nahi dalo aap jaisa. Aap bas aise aise kar dijiye aise kar dijiye aise kar dijiye. Ji bataiye. Thik.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add Mahindra DG set name.

- Wants to know the rate for Ashok leyland.

- Wants to promote IndiaMART, not other brands.

- Wants to know where the product will be visible.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to add Mahindra DG set name.

- Executive explained the importance of adding products.

- Executive sent a screenshot of the product.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the profile and inform.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product, mahindra, dg set, diesel generator, ashok leyland
